projectsData.title: Shop house
projectsData.overview: This is my first e-commerce app, It has been done in NextJS, Using Tailwind. I could apply Stripe Checkout for payment for the first time, The website has a separate Admin website where the admin can add and remove products, used AWS SÂ£ bucket for photo storage

projectsData.title: Hulu-Video
projectsData.overview: I built this application in Next JS and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is pulling movie data from an the TMDB movie API and displaying different categories.It is using serverside rendering , dynamic pages and lazzy loading.It has the option to search any movies and its information

projectsData.title: Latest-News
projectsData.overview: I built this application in Next JS 13 and TypeScripts and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is pulling news data from an the Mediastack API, use StepZen and Qraphl query .It is using serverside rendering , dynamic pages and lazzy loading.It has the option to search any new and its information

projectsData.title: Top-Seller-Books
projectsData.overview: I built this application in React and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is pulling best sellers book data from an the New Yourk Times API

projectsData.title: Weather-Api
projectsData.overview: I built this application in React, TypeScript and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is pulling weather information base on user input from an the OpenWeather API

projectsData.title: Quiezical
projectsData.overview: I built this application in React and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is pulling random questions from an the Trivia API

projectsData.title: Password-Generator
projectsData.overview: I built this chrome extension in JavaScript and is hosted on GitHub pages.This application is generating 3 random words as a password based on your reference
